OrgName: New Media Learning LLC d/b/a workplaceanswers.com
activities: New Media Learning LLC, d/b/a Workplace Answers' collects customer information when it is provided to Workplace Answers by the training administrator (either by submitting a spreadsheet to Workplace Answers or by registering an employee for training using the Learning Management System (LMS) interface. Information collected may include personal information about an individual such as name, email address, company name, company address and company phone number. This information is used to track completed course work and will be provided to the user's employer upon request. Workplace Answers is not responsible for how employee's company treats personal information provided
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer and organization data.  All online
recoursemech: We have engaged the services of BBB EU Safe Harbor, reference number EU8454803-29-11, to be our independent recourse provider regarding all types of data other than organization human resources data, and have agreed to cooperate and comply with the EU data protection authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner regarding organization human resources data.
